_instructions: This file defines all MCP servers. API keys are automatically populated from .env file during installation.

tavily-remote-mcp._description: Tavily MCP - Web search and research. Required for 'search' skill.

context7._description: Context7 MCP - Developer documentation search. Required for 'search' skill.

grep._description: Grep MCP - Search across a million public GitHub repositories. Required for 'search' skill.

openalex-research._description: OpenAlex MCP - Academic paper discovery and citation analysis. Required for 'research' skill.

pdf-reader._description: PDF Reader MCP - PDF text extraction. Required for 'research' skill.

paper-search._description: Paper-search MCP - Multi-platform academic paper search and download. Optional for 'research' skill.
paper-search._note: Includes Google Scholar + Sci-Hub integration. Check Terms of Service and legal considerations.
